description: This file defines an Angular service called AuthService that manages user authentication, token storage, and profile information within the application. It handles login, logout, token management, and user data retrieval.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Manages user authentication, token storage, and profile information. Provides methods for login, logout, fetching user profile, and managing tokens.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user using provided credentials and fetches authentication tokens.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Fetches the current user's profile information.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clears tokens, and optionally navigates to login page.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Retrieves the current stored access token.

methods.name: setTokens
methods.description: Stores authentication tokens in localStorage and updates internal reactive signals.

methods.name: getToken
methods.description: Retrieves the access token from localStorage.
